projects: [{"title":"COVID-19 Project | DoSW, IIT Roorkee","start_date":"May 2021","end_date":"Aug 2021","description":"- Led a team of 18 students to conduct prediction of the next wave of COVID-19 in terms of timeline & severity- Established a comprehensive set of SOPs for campus operation amongst COVID-19 crisis customised to IITR"},{},{},{"title":"Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision Landscape in India | ShARE Global","start_date":"Feb 2020","end_date":"May 2020","description":"- Advised a Japanese automotive manufacturer giant on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Computer Vision (CV) landscape in India. - Carried out a thorough research on AI and CV landscape involving startups, Industry giants, and academic institutions along with the development of a solid understanding of the technology. - Strategically filtered academicians, startups, and incubators relevant to the client with the help of a structured framework involving various socio-economic parameters."},{},{}]
